name: UIUC Courses App
description: A Java project that combines server/client integration in Android Studio. Sorts and allows searching of classes offered at UIUC.

name: Hawaiian Words
description: Translation app that writes out the pronunciation of any given Hawaiian word and checks for valid/ invalid words.

name: Volunteer Group Builder
description: Given a set of volunteers with certain capabilities such as stamina, this program makes groups of volunteers so that every group has an almost equal capabilities build.

name: Mountain Paths
description: Given an elevation data file, this program finds the easiest mountain path to take to get across any mountain.

name: Seam Carving
description: There are so many ways to crop an image, but seam carving is the optimal solution as you don't lose out on any of the subject matter-ever.

name: Naive Database
description: A simple yet functional database that is made up of tables, and easily can add and remove elements with effortless size management.

name: Cord Binary Trees
description: A specific type of binary tree that stores strings and multiple operations such as concatenation can be performed upon.

name: Illini Book
description: A simple social media network graph project, where people are related based on a certain relationship that they share with each other.
